title: Spotify
shortDescription: Add playlists, tracks, and follow buttons to your site.
longDescription:
Add Spotify widgets to your web pages and let your web visitors play tracks and follow Spotify profiles.

Add a Spotify Play Button to your blog, website, or social page—all your fans have to do is hit “Play” to enjoy the music. You can create Play Buttons for albums, tracks, artists, or playlists.

When a logged-in Spotify user clicks the button, the music will start playing in the Spotify player. If the user is not logged into their Spotify account, the Spotify Play Button will play a 30-second audio preview of the music, and they will be prompted to login or sign up.

You can choose different button themes and sizes, and you can link to any song or album in our music catalog, or to any playlist that you have created.
author: Spotify Inc.

categories.title: Widgets & Plugins
categories.description: Apps that add functionality and services to your website.

categories.title: Add-ons
categories.description: Drop-in components to add to your website.

categories.title: Recommended for Blogs
categories.description: Apps for blogs in the recommendation engine.
